metadata.title: CVE-2023-50120 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: MP4Box GPAC version 2.3-DEV-rev636-gfbd7e13aa-master was discovered tocontain an infinite loop in the function av1_uvlc atmedia_tools/av_parsers.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause aDenial of Service (DoS) via a crafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
